body_html: Newbie question: how do I get a list of all registered opkernels? If it's easy, the error message could advise the user on how to peruse the list. It would then become obvious to the user that, e.g., the op they wanted wasn't registered for the gpu...
body_text: Newbie question: how do I get a list of all registered opkernels?  If it's easy, the error message could advise the user on how to peruse the list.  It would then become obvious to the user that, e.g., the op they wanted wasn't registered for the gpu...
body: Newbie question: how do I get a list of all registered opkernels?  If it's easy, the error message could advise the user on how to peruse the list.  It would then become obvious to the user that, e.g., the op they wanted wasn't registered for the gpu...
